mapper.select: select gallery.NO, gallery.CONTENT, gallery.SAVENAME, users.name as userName from gallery join users on users.no = gallery.user_no where gallery.NO = #{no}

select gallery.NO, gallery.USER_NO, gallery.CONTENT, gallery.FILEPATH, gallery.ORGNAME, gallery.SAVENAME, gallery.FILESIZE, users.name as userName from gallery join users on users.no = gallery.user_no order by gallery.no DESC
mapper.insert: insert into gallery ( NO, USER_NO, CONTENT, FILEPATH, ORGNAME, SAVENAME, FILESIZE ) values( seq_gallery_no.nextval, #{user_no}, #{content}, #{filePath}, #{orgName}, #{saveName}, #{fileSize} )
